results.title: In vivo enhanced antitumor activity of carmustine [N,N'-bis(2-chloroethyl)-N-nitrosourea] by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: The combination of the lowest doses tested (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 25 mg/kg/day and @CHEMICAL_Carmustine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002330 @@@BCNU@@@ 0.3 mg/kg) resulted in a significant growth delay (compared to either drug alone) in @<m>DISEASE_Complement_Component_6_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567307 @@@C6 glioma@@@ (P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Soma MR, Baetta R, De Renzis MR, Mazzini G, Davegna C, Magrassi L, Butti G, Pezzotta S, Paoletti R, Fumagalli R. In vivo enhanced antitumor activity of carmustine [N,N'-bis(2-chloroethyl)-N-nitrosourea] by simvastatin. Cancer Res. 1995 Feb 1;55(3):597-602. PMID: 7834630
citations.BibTeX: @article{7834630, title={In vivo enhanced antitumor activity of carmustine [N,N'-bis(2-chloroethyl)-N-nitrosourea] by simvastatin.}, author={Soma MR and Baetta R and De Renzis MR and Mazzini G and Davegna C and Magrassi L and Butti G and Pezzotta S and Paoletti R and Fumagalli R}, journal={Cancer Res}, volume={55}, number={3}, pages={597-602}}

results.title: Ginkgo biloba extract regulates differentially the cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide and simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ induces proliferation inhibition and apoptosis in @<m>DISEASE_Complement_Component_6_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567307 @@@C6 glioma@@@ cells via c-jun N-terminal kinase.

citations.NLM: Altiok N, Ersoz M, Karpuz V, Koyuturk M. Ginkgo biloba extract regulates differentially the cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide and simvastatin. Neurotoxicology. 2006 Mar;27(2):158-63. PMID: 16185767
citations.BibTeX: @article{16185767, title={Ginkgo biloba extract regulates differentially the cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide and simvastatin.}, author={Altiok N and Ersoz M and Karpuz V and Koyuturk M}, journal={Neurotoxicology}, volume={27}, number={2}, pages={158-63}}
